assetProfile.address1: Little Bear Smart Park, No. 3, Fuxing Rd
assetProfile.address2: Fu'an Industrial Zone Leliu Street Shunde District
assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Bear Electric Appliance Co.,Ltd. engages in the research, design, production, and sale of household appliances in China. The company offers small kitchen appliances, including rice cookers, hot pots, wall breakers, electric cookers, noodle presses, breakers, air fryers, dough mixers, yogurt machines, soymilk machines, electric kettles, water dispenser, steam ovens, whisks, egg boilers, electric lunch boxes, health pots, folding water pumps, rice roll machines, casseroles, meat grinders, toasters, and choppers; and small household appliances comprising electric fans, humidifiers, hot water dispensers, garment steamers, health cups, electric thermos, circulation fans, vacuum cleaners, electric heaters, and washing machines. It also provides personal care appliances, including chiropractic instruments, wash your phone, wireless massagers, hair dryers, massage shoulder pillows, skin rejuvenation instrument, skin beauty shower, hair straightener, vanity mirrors, fascia guns, neck massager, and hydrating instruments; and baby products, including milk conditioners, blenders, and shakers, as well as bottle warmer, charging insulation bowls, breast pumps, BB pots, and milk powder boxes. Its products are used by children, young people, middle-aged, and elderly customers. The company also offers its products through online store. Bear Electric Appliance Co.,Ltd. was founded in 2006 and is based in Foshan, China.
